name: Forget Me Not (beanthany)
description:
Come away to a magical forest! Take a break, make some tea, and help out the locals.

This game was made for CMPUT 250 at the University of Alberta, by Seal the Deal Studios!

  • Anastasia Borissova (Art)
  • Bethany Gerlach (Writing)
  • Eoin De Groot (Sound)
  • Shasta Johnsen-Sollos (Programming)
  • Emma Bajestani (Programming)
  • Sirous Ghafuri (Programming)
  • Morgan Cselinacz (EP)
